Proposals¶

The Core app contains a few common features of the eusay app - the Content model and about page view, as well as the template filters and templates for all pages.

Models¶

class proposals.models.Proposal(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Proposal(id, createdAt, lastModified, user_id, upVotes, downVotes, isHidden, rank, title, text, slug)

class proposals.models.Response(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Response(id, createdAt, lastModified, user_id, upVotes, downVotes, isHidden, rank, text, proposal_id)

clean_text()[source]¶
